sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations with noisy data
message_1:
Consider the following system of linear equations with noisy data: 

\begin{cases} 
2x + 3y + 2z = 8.5 \\
5x - 7y + 3z = 7.1 \\
x + 2y - 4z = -2.2 
\end{cases}

Find the solution for this system using the Gauss-Jordan elimination method with partial pivoting. Round your answer to one decimal place.
message_2:
To solve the system of linear equations using the Gauss-Jordan elimination method with partial pivoting, we first write the augmented matrix:

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
2 & 3 & 2 & 8.5 \\
5 & -7 & 3 & 7.1 \\
1 & 2 & -4 & -2.2
\end{array}\right]
$$

Step 1: Partial pivoting - swap row 1 and row 3 to have the largest absolute value in the first column:

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
1 & 2 & -4 & -2.2 \\
5 & -7 & 3 & 7.1 \\
2 & 3 & 2 & 8.5
\end{array}\right]
$$

Step 2: Eliminate the first column below the pivot element (1):

Row 2 = Row 2 - 5 * Row 1
Row 3 = Row 3 - 2 * Row 1

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
1 & 2 & -4 & -2.2 \\
0 & -17 & 23 & 17.1 \\
0 & -1 & 10 & 13.9
\end{array}\right]
$$

Step 3: Partial pivoting - swap row 2 and row 3 to have the largest absolute value in the second column:

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
1 & 2 & -4 & -2.2 \\
0 & -1 & 10 & 13.9 \\
0 & -17 & 23 & 17.1
\end{array}\right]
$$

Step 4: Eliminate the second column below the pivot element (-1):

Row 3 = Row 3 - 17 * Row 2

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
1 & 2 & -4 & -2.2 \\
0 & -1 & 10 & 13.9 \\
0 & 0 & -147 & -220.3
\end{array}\right]
$$

Step 5: Normalize the last row:

Row 3 = Row 3 / (-147)

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
1 & 2 & -4 & -2.2 \\
0 & -1 & 10 & 13.9 \\
0 & 0 & 1 & 1.5
\end{array}\right]
$$

Step 6: Back substitution:

Row 1 = Row 1 + 4 * Row 3
Row 2 = Row 2 - 10 * Row 3

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
1 & 2 & 0 & 4.0 \\
0 & -1 & 0 & -1.9 \\
0 & 0 & 1 & 1.5
\end{array}\right]
$$

Row 1 = Row 1 - 2 * Row 2

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
1 & 0 & 0 & 7.8 \\
0 & -1 & 0 & -1.9 \\
0 & 0 & 1 & 1.5
\end{array}\right]
$$

Finally, normalize the second row:

Row 2 = Row 2 * (-1)

$$
\left[\begin{array}{ccc|c}
1 & 0 & 0 & 7.8 \\
0 & 1 & 0 & 1.9 \\
0 & 0 & 1 & 1.5
\end{array}\right]
$$

The solution to the system of linear equations is:

$$
x \approx 7.8 \\
y \approx 1.9 \\
z \approx 1.5
$$
